column1: The notification text which will be displayed on cart page. Please note that the "%s" will be replaced with the price, so you have to add it in the proper place within the text. You can use HTML tags also.
column2: The notification text which will be displayed on cart page. Please note that the "%s" will be replaced with the price, so you have to add it in the proper place within the text. You can use HTML tags also.

column1: Enable to show tax information. For example: excl. or incl. tax in parentheses.
column2: Enable to show tax information. For example: excl. or incl. tax in parentheses.

column1: Please select the tax information text to display after price. If automatic is selected the tax information text will be showed depends on the whole cart tax.
column2: Please select the tax information text to display after price. If automatic is selected the tax information text will be showed depends on the whole cart tax.

column1: Enable to show free shipping information in sidebar automatically.
column2: Enable to show free shipping information in sidebar automatically.

column1: The title of the sidebar's free shipping notification block.
